credentialSubject.description: Stores the data of the credential
credentialSubject.title: Credential subject

id.description: Stores the DID of the subject that owns the credential
id.title: Credential subject ID

probability.description: A probability of the age estimation being accurate
probability.title: probability of correcteness

verificationMethod.description: assurance method used for estimating the credential subject's age eg: voice, facial scan, document check, document and face match, or other.
verificationMethod.title: assurance method used

verificationMethodId.description: Numeric id the of verification method used. Values: 1 - voice, 2 - facial scan, 3 - document check, 4 -document and face match, or 5 - other.
verificationMethodId.title: verification method numeric id

ageRange.description: Estimated age range for the subject
ageRange.title: Estimated Age Range

minAgeRange.description: Minimum Age Range estimated for the subject
minAgeRange.title: Minimum Age Range

maxAgeRange.description: Maximum Age Range estimated for the subject
maxAgeRange.title: Maximum Age Range

levelOfConfidence.description: Levels of confidence with which the verification has been completed allowed values: "asserted", "basic" (90%+), "standard" (99%+), "enhanced" (99.9%+) , and "strict" (99.99%+).  Refer to  IS0/IEC 27566 â€“ Age assurance systems - for more details.
levelOfConfidence.title: Level of confidence

credentialStatus.description: Allows the discovery of information about the current status of the credential, such as whether it is suspended or revoked.
credentialStatus.title: Credential Status

type.description: Expresses the credential status type (method). The value should provide enough information to determine the current status of the credential.
type.title: Type
